onReceive(android.content.Context, andro.FullName: public void onReceive (Context context, Intent intent)

ClassDesc: Google Analytics receiver for com.android.vending.INSTALL_REFERRER. Google Play will broadcast the intent when an app is installed from the Google Play Store and has campaign data available (i.e. the app was installed from a link to the Google Play Store). This @B_android#content#BroadcastReceiver_E@ registers for that @B_android#content#Intent_E@ and passes the campaign data to Google Analytics. To enable installation campaign reporting register both CampaignTrackingReceiver and CampaignTrackingService in your AndroidManifest.xml file:
